note.title: Conjure Fey
note.text:
The following Fey are valid targets for the spell Conjure Fey: 6th-Level Slot: • Blink Dog • Dryad • Green Hag • Pixie • Satyr • Sea Hag • Sprite
Additionally, the following Beasts are valid targets of this spell: 6th-Level Slot: • Allosaurus • Ankylosaurus • Ape • Axe Beak • Baboon • Badger • Bat • Black Bear • Blood Hawk • Boar • Brown Bear • Camel • Cat • Cave Bear • Constrictor Snake • Crab • Crocodile • Deer • Dire Wolf • Draft Horse • Eagle • Elephant • Elk • Flying Snake • Frog • Giant Badger • Giant Bat • Giant Boar • Giant Centipede • Giant Constrictor Snake • Giant Crab • Giant Crocodile • Giant Eagle • Giant Elk • Giant Fire Beetle • Giant Fly • Giant Frog • Giant Goat • Giant Hyena • Giant Lizard • Giant Octopus • Giant Owl • Giant Poisonous Snake • Giant Rat • Giant Rat (Diseased) • Giant Scorpion • Giant Sea Horse • Giant Shark • Giant Spider • Giant Toad • Giant Vulture • Giant Wasp • Giant Weasel • Giant Wolf Spider • Goat • Hawk • Hunter Shark • Hyena • Jackal • Killer Whale • Lion • Lizard • Mammoth • Mastiff • Mule • Octopus • Owl • Panther • Plesiosaurus • Poisonous Snake • Polar Bear • Pony • Pteranodon • Quipper • Rat • Raven • Reef Shark • Rhinoceros • Riding Horse • Saber-Toothed Tiger • Scorpion • Sea Horse • Spider • Stirge • Tiger • Triceratops • Vulture • Warhorse • Weasel • Wolf
7th-Level Slot: • Giant Ape
8th-Level Slot: • Tyrannosaurus Rex
